title: Memphis Belle (1990) WW2 bomber (Widescreen,optional MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0100133/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0100133/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files (Work in WMP):
Croatian (Hrvatski), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, English for the hearing impaired, Finnish, French, Greek, German, Hebrew, Hungarian, Icelandic, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish.

One of the best war films made, according to my taste. Especially because almost all the young actors managed to continue a successful career. Based on a true story.

I finally found the new widescreen PAL edition, which has not been available anywhere before. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith.

This is an improved version of the torrent I uploaded in June.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x416, great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
